response.original_title: The Christmas Rescue: A Big Movie
response.overview: When Christmas is suddenly put in danger, Elmo and his friends must jump into action and race against time to save the holiday. With the North Pole's systems failing and chaos spreading across the city, the team embarks on a fast-paced rescue mission filled with wild obstacles, unexpected challenges, and nonstop holiday excitement. As the clock ticks down, they discover that only teamwork, quick thinking, and courage can stop Christmas from disappearing forever.
response.title: The Christmas Rescue: A Big Movie
